page.title: 10Religion
page.content: The main religious membership is Church of England,Roman Catholic,and Methodist.There is a Methodist Chapel in Islip which has a good congregation.Oddington,Noke,and Islip all have churches.Oddington church is served by the Vicar from Charlton on Otmoor (outside the area).Noke is served by the Rector of St Nicholas Church Islip,who also serves Woodeaton Church outside the area.The nearest Roman Catholic Church is in Kidlington 3 miles away.Apart from the main Religious festivals,and at weddings,christenings,and funerals,the C of E church congregations are small and made up of mostly older women. Church restoration is a major problem.Noke and Woodeaton have been saved for the time being,but Islip needs twenty thousand pounds spending on it now.
